tool_description: StreamlineWatch's streaming guide APIs for Movies and Shows
title: StreamlineWatch - Streaming Guide

api_list.name: /shows/{id}/episodes
api_list.description: List all the episodes from the show

required_parameters.name: platform
required_parameters.description:
Retrieve sources from the specified platform.
*required, possible values: ios, android, androidtv, web*

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips this number of records.
*optional, default: 0*

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Filter by region.
*optional, default: US*
*possible values: US, FR*

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of records to return per request.
*optional, default: 25, max: 100*

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Sort the records in regular order or reverse order to get most recent episodes first.
*optional, default: regular*
*possible values: regular, reverse*

optional_parameters.name: season
optional_parameters.description:
A particular season for a show. Do not specify any value to get the episodes from all the seasons.
*optional*

api_list.name: regions
api_list.description: Retrieve the list of regions covered by the API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://streamlinewatch-streaming-guide.p.rapidapi.com/regions"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "streamlinewatch-streaming-guide.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Returns a list of titles that match the query.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description:
The type of content of your research.
*required, possible values: movie, show*

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of record to return.
*optional, default: 10, max: 100*

body.title: Embrace the Panda: Making Turning Red

api_list.name: /shows/{id}
api_list.description: Return the metadata associated with the specified show.

required_parameters.name: platform
required_parameters.description:
Retrieve sources from the specified platform.
*required, possible values: ios, android, androidtv, web*

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the show. You can also use a tmdb id.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Retrieve the sources' deep link from this region
*optional, default: US*
*possible values: US, FR*

body.overview: After the fall of the Galactic Empire, lawlessness has spread throughout the galaxy. A lone gunfighter makes his way through the outer reaches, earning his keep as a bounty hunter.
body.title: The Mandalorian

api_list.name: /movies/{id}
api_list.description: Return the metadata associated with the specified movie.

required_parameters.name: platform
required_parameters.description:
Retrieve sources from the specified platform.
*required, possible values: ios, android, androidtv, web*

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the movie. You can also use a tmdb id.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Retrieve the sources' deep link from this region
*optional, default: US*
*possible values: US, FR*

body.overview: Thirteen-year-old Mei is experiencing the awkwardness of being a teenager with a twist – when she gets too excited, she transforms into a giant red panda.
body.title: Turning Red

api_list.name: /movies
api_list.description: Returns the basic metadata for all movies available for playback in a specific region. The results are ordered by popularity or alphabetical order. You may get additional information about each movie using its ID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of records to return per request.
*optional, default: 25, max: 100*

optional_parameters.name: sources
optional_parameters.description:
Filter records by source. Multiple sources may be comma-separated.
*optional*
*possible values: free, tv_everywhere, subscription, purchase, a specific source such as netflix or hulu*

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Filter by region.
*optional, default: US*
*possible values: US, FR*

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips this number of records.
*optional, default: 0*

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Method to sort the records.
*optional, default: alphabetical*
*possible values:alphabetical, popularity*

body.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.
body.title: The Dark Knight

body.overview: Deadpool tells the origin story of former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.
body.title: Deadpool

body.overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
body.title: Django Unchained

body.overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
body.title: The Shawshank Redemption

body.overview: Driven by tragedy, billionaire Bruce Wayne dedicates his life to uncovering and defeating the corruption that plagues his home, Gotham City.  Unable to work within the system, he instead creates a new identity, a symbol of fear for the criminal underworld - The Batman.
body.title: Batman Begins

api_list.name: /sources
api_list.description: Returns a list of all sources covered in a specific region

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description:
Filter by region.
*required, possible values: US, FR*

api_list.name: /genres
api_list.description: Return a list of all genres
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://streamlinewatch-streaming-guide.p.rapidapi.com/genres"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "streamlinewatch-streaming-guide.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /shows
api_list.description: Returns the basic metadata for all shows available for playback in a specific region. The results are ordered by popularity or alphabetical order. You may get additional information about each show using its ID.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips this number of records.
*optional, default: 0*

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of records to return per request.
*optional, default: 25, max: 100*

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Method to sort the records.
*optional, default: alphabetical*
*possible values:alphabetical, popularity*

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Filter by region.
*optional, default: US*
*possible values: US, FR*

optional_parameters.name: sources
optional_parameters.description:
Filter records by source. Multiple sources may be comma-separated.
*optional*
*possible values: free, tv_everywhere, subscription, purchase, a specific source such as netflix or hulu*

body.overview: To carry out the biggest heist in history, a mysterious man called The Professor recruits a band of eight robbers who have a single characteristic: none of them has anything to lose. Five months of seclusion - memorizing every step, every detail, every probability - culminate in eleven days locked up in the National Coinage and Stamp Factory of Spain, surrounded by police forces and with dozens of hostages in their power, to find out whether their suicide wager will lead to everything or nothing.
body.title: Money Heist

body.overview: Sheriff's deputy Rick Grimes awakens from a coma to find a post-apocalyptic world dominated by flesh-eating zombies. He sets out to find his family and encounters many other survivors along the way.
body.title: The Walking Dead

body.overview: Set in the present, the series offers a bold, subversive take on Archie, Betty, Veronica and their friends, exploring the surreality of small-town life, the darkness and weirdness bubbling beneath Riverdale’s wholesome facade.
body.title: Riverdale

body.overview: Bored and unhappy as the Lord of Hell, Lucifer Morningstar abandoned his throne and retired to Los Angeles, where he has teamed up with LAPD detective Chloe Decker to take down criminals. But the longer he's away from the underworld, the greater the threat that the worst of humanity could escape.
body.title: Lucifer

body.overview: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games—with high stakes. But, a tempting prize awaits the victor.
body.title: Squid Game
